mapper.select: SELECT p.`prodNo`, p.`prodName`, p.`thumb1`, p.`price`, p.`disPrice`, o.`ordNo`, o.`count`, o.`color`, o.`size`, o.`rdate` FROM `ordercomplete` AS oc JOIN `order` AS o ON oc.`ordNo`=o.`ordNo` JOIN `product` AS p ON o.`prodNo`=p.`prodNo` WHERE uid = #{uid};

SELECT p.`prodNo`, p.`prodName`, p.`thumb1`, p.`price`, p.`disPrice`, p.`company`, o.`ordNo`, o.`count`, o.`color`, o.`size`, o.`rdate` FROM `ordercomplete` AS oc JOIN `order` AS o USING (`ordNo`) JOIN `product` AS p USING (`prodNo`) WHERE `uid` = #{uid} AND o.`rdate` > DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL ${date} MONTH);

SELECT p.`prodNo`, p.`prodName`, p.`thumb1`, p.`price`, p.`disPrice`, p.`company`, o.`ordNo`, o.`count`, o.`color`, o.`size`, o.`rdate` FROM `ordercomplete` AS oc JOIN `order` AS o USING (`ordNo`) JOIN `product` AS p USING (`prodNo`) WHERE `uid` = #{uid} AND DATE(o.`rdate`) BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY o.`rdate` DESC LIMIT #{pg}, 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `ordercomplete` AS oc JOIN `order` AS o USING (`ordNo`) JOIN `product` AS p USING (`prodNo`) WHERE `uid` = #{uid} AND DATE(o.`rdate`) BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end};
